thread.title: Exclusive: Syrian army starts using new weapons from Russia - military source
thread.title_full: Exclusive: Syrian army starts using new weapons from Russia - military source

title: Exclusive: Syrian army starts using new weapons from Russia - military source
text:
17 Exclusive: Syrian army starts using new weapons from Russia - military source 
Reuters: The Syrian military has recently started using new types of air and ground weapons supplied by Russia, a Syrian military source told Reuters on Thursday, underlining growing Russian support to Damascus that is alarming the United States.The source described the weapons as highly accurate and effective. The army had started using them in recent weeks having been trained in their use in Syria in recent months, the source said.
